name: Cookie Store
description:
Welcome to the Cookie Store!

Would you be interested in a cute, happy, and colorful life as a cafe owner? You can find it in this Visual Novel! Please take a look at our menu below.

Menu:

  • get closer to your employees and friends
    - 6 different character routes
  • three possible endings of the main story
    - but the game will not end there...
  • uplifting music and colorful art
    - partially animated characters
    - 14 illustrations and characters gallery to unlock
  • test your skills and... luck
    - simple minigame simulating financial progress (tutorial included)

Full course might take about 3 hours or more (all routes, depending on reading speed and time in minigames)
